content.query:
CREATE SCHEMA GOLD;

CREATE VIEW GOLD.CALENDAR
AS
SELECT * 
FROM
OPENROWSET
(
    BULK 'https://pythonstorageaccount01.blob.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Calendar',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) 
as  Query1;


 CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL cred_syam
WITH
    IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity';




 CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE Mydatasource01
 WITH
 (
    LOCATION='https://pythonstorageaccount01.blob.core.windows.net/gold/'
 );


 CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT myfileformat
 WITH
 (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION ='org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
    );

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE GOLD.myexternaltable01
(
    customer_id NVARCHAR(50),
    customer_name NVARCHAR(50),
    order_date DATE
)
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'AdventureWorks_Calendar/',
    DATA_SOURCE =Mydatasource,
    FILE_FORMAT=myfileformat

);


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE GOLD.myexternaltable01
(
    customer_id NVARCHAR(50),
    customer_name NVARCHAR(50),
    order_date DATE
)
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'AdventureWorks_Calendar/',
    DATA_SOURCE =Mydatasource,
    FILE_FORMAT=myfileformat

);
